content:
That sounds like a great plan! Museum cafés can be such a convenient and pleasant option, especially when you're already at the museum and don't want to venture out. And if you know they have good food, like the quiche, it's even better! It's lovely that you have a nice memory of sharing lunch with your sister at the café during your previous visit, and I'm sure you'll enjoy doing it again.

Grabbing lunch at the café will also give you both a chance to take a break and discuss the exhibit while it's still fresh in your minds. You can share your thoughts and impressions of the photographs, and maybe even debate or discuss the meaning behind some of the pieces.

It's great that you're planning a relaxing and enjoyable day out with your sister. I hope you both have a wonderful time at the museum and café!
